005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.binding.metaschema;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.StringAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLineAdapter;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.JsonGroupAsBehavior;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValue;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValues;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundAssembly;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundField;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.GroupAs;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.ValueConstraints;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.IConstraintBase;
026
027import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
028import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
029
030import java.util.LinkedList;
031import java.util.List;
032
033@SuppressWarnings({
034    "PMD.DataClass",
035    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
036})
037@MetaschemaAssembly(
038    formalName = "Value Matches Constraint",
039    name = "flag-matches",
040    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
041public class FlagMatches implements IBoundObject, IConstraintBase {
042  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
043
044  @BoundFlag(
045      formalName = "Constraint Identifier",
046      name = "id",
047      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
048  private String _id;
049
050  @BoundFlag(
051      formalName = "Constraint Severity Level",
052      name = "level",
053      defaultValue = "ERROR",
054      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
055      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR, values = {
056          @AllowedValue(value = "CRITICAL",
057              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a serious fault in the content that will prevent typical use of the content."),
058          @AllowedValue(value = "ERROR",
059              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a fault in the content. This may include issues around compatibility, integrity, consistency, etc."),
060          @AllowedValue(value = "WARNING",
061              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a potential issue with the content."),
062          @AllowedValue(value = "INFORMATIONAL",
063              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a point of interest."),
064          @AllowedValue(value = "DEBUG",
065              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a fault in the content that may warrant review by a developer when performing model or tool development.") })))
066  private String _level;
067
068  @BoundFlag(
069      formalName = "Matches Regular Expression",
070      name = "regex",
071      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
072  private String _regex;
073
074  @BoundFlag(
075      formalName = "Matches Data Type",
076      name = "datatype",
077      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
078      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR,
079          allowOthers = true,
080          values = { @AllowedValue(value = "base64", description = ""),
081              @AllowedValue(value = "boolean", description = ""), @AllowedValue(value = "date", description = ""),
082              @AllowedValue(value = "date-time", description = ""),
083              @AllowedValue(value = "date-time-with-timezone", description = ""),
084              @AllowedValue(value = "date-with-timezone", description = ""),
085              @AllowedValue(value = "day-time-duration", description = ""),
086              @AllowedValue(value = "decimal", description = ""),
087              @AllowedValue(value = "email-address", description = ""),
088              @AllowedValue(value = "hostname", description = ""), @AllowedValue(value = "integer", description = ""),
089              @AllowedValue(value = "ip-v4-address", description = ""),
090              @AllowedValue(value = "ip-v6-address", description = ""),
091              @AllowedValue(value = "non-negative-integer", description = ""),
092              @AllowedValue(value = "positive-integer", description = ""),
093              @AllowedValue(value = "string", description = ""), @AllowedValue(value = "token", description = ""),
094              @AllowedValue(value = "uri", description = ""), @AllowedValue(value = "uri-reference", description = ""),
095              @AllowedValue(value = "uuid", description = ""), @AllowedValue(value = "base64Binary", description = ""),
096              @AllowedValue(value = "dateTime", description = ""),
097              @AllowedValue(value = "dateTime-with-timezone", description = ""),
098              @AllowedValue(value = "email", description = ""),
099              @AllowedValue(value = "nonNegativeInteger", description = ""),
100              @AllowedValue(value = "positiveInteger", description = "") })))
101  private String _datatype;
102
103  @BoundField(
104      formalName = "Formal Name",
105      description = "A formal name for the data construct, to be presented in documentation.",
106      useName = "formal-name")
107  private String _formalName;
108
109  @BoundField(
110      formalName = "Description",
111      description = "A short description of the data construct's purpose, describing the constructs semantics.",
112      useName = "description",
113      typeAdapter = MarkupLineAdapter.class)
114  private MarkupLine _description;
115
116  @BoundAssembly(
117      formalName = "Property",
118      useName = "prop",
119      maxOccurs = -1,
120      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "props", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
121  private List<Property> _props;
122
123  @BoundField(
124      formalName = "Remarks",
125      description = "Any explanatory or helpful information to be provided about the remarks parent.",
126      useName = "remarks")
127  private Remarks _remarks;
128
129  public FlagMatches() {
130    this(null);
131  }
132
133  public FlagMatches(IMetaschemaData data) {
134    this.__metaschemaData = data;
135  }
136
137  @Override
138  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
139    return __metaschemaData;
140  }
141
142  @Override
143  public String getId() {
144    return _id;
145  }
146
147  public void setId(String value) {
148    _id = value;
149  }
150
151  @Override
152  public String getLevel() {
153    return _level;
154  }
155
156  public void setLevel(String value) {
157    _level = value;
158  }
159
160  public String getRegex() {
161    return _regex;
162  }
163
164  public void setRegex(String value) {
165    _regex = value;
166  }
167
168  public String getDatatype() {
169    return _datatype;
170  }
171
172  public void setDatatype(String value) {
173    _datatype = value;
174  }
175
176  @Override
177  public String getFormalName() {
178    return _formalName;
179  }
180
181  public void setFormalName(String value) {
182    _formalName = value;
183  }
184
185  @Override
186  public MarkupLine getDescription() {
187    return _description;
188  }
189
190  public void setDescription(MarkupLine value) {
191    _description = value;
192  }
193
194  @Override
195  public List<Property> getProps() {
196    return _props;
197  }
198
199  public void setProps(List<Property> value) {
200    _props = value;
201  }
202
203  /**
204   * Add a new {@link Property} item to the underlying collection.
205   *
206   * @param item
207   *          the item to add
208   * @return {@code true}
209   */
210  public boolean addProp(Property item) {
211    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
212    if (_props == null) {
213      _props = new LinkedList<>();
214    }
215    return _props.add(value);
216  }
217
218  /**
219   * Remove the first matching {@link Property} item from the underlying
220   * collection.
221   *
222   * @param item
223   *          the item to remove
224   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
225   */
226  public boolean removeProp(Property item) {
227    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
228    return _props != null && _props.remove(value);
229  }
230
231  @Override
232  public Remarks getRemarks() {
233    return _remarks;
234  }
235
236  public void setRemarks(Remarks value) {
237    _remarks = value;
238  }
239
240  @Override
241  public String toString() {
242    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
243  }
244}
